next_steps.step: Address the lower 'product_A_ratio' by highlighting the complementary benefits of other Schneider Electric products and solutions within the proposed offering, emphasizing overall value.
Proactively re-engage the customer to boost 'customer_activity', confirming their needs are being met and reinforcing the value proposition with tailored demos or case studies.
Develop specific strategies to counter the competitors mentioned, focusing on Schneider Electric's unique differentiators and competitive advantages relevant to this customer's needs.
